Texts.Chs: 想象一下，在一颗半影行星上有一座水上城市，每个季节都会被烧成灰烬？当然，如果是这样的话，夜族人就有理由逃到地下，再也不回来了。
Texts.Eng: Low-ranked warriors are permitted to socialize with whom they please, though doing so with too much frequency will earn them the title of Vilmaehkt. This is a grave insult, meaning Red-Blood. On their world, due to low oxygen, their blood is blue. A Vilmaehkt is a 'filthy outsider', unworthy.

Texts.Chs: 但这也不太可能造成我们所看到的严重的文化恐慌。相反，我认为某种形式的大气效应，也许是它们的母星所独有的，是造成这种现象的原因。也许在他们的行星历史上，形成了臭氧空洞。
Texts.Eng: The lower the rank of the warrior, the more vibrant the mask will become. Unblooded warriors (those with no battlefield experience) instead wear a black mask adorned with a singular blue stripe in the center. Their low rank also means they serve as envoys to the galaxy at large.

Texts.Chs: 夜族人是在哪里对未知和光产生如此强烈的恐惧的？虽然他们对阳光有直接的反应(阳光对他们的几个分支是致命的，但在大多数情况下仅仅是有毒的，并引起类似于过敏反应的反应) ,
Texts.Eng: The white mask of the Nightar warrior should be observed very carefully. There are many reasons to this, the most visible being this: the more plain the mask, the more skilled the warrior. The highest ranked among their kind wear one that is plain white, with only narrow slits for eyes.

Texts.Chs: 如果是这样的话，行星的自转使这个洞跨过天空，照耀着下面的世界，那将是一个集中的光束，可以按季节将整个区域烧焦。这对文化和发展产生的影响是毋庸置疑的，因为它也会使行星表面几乎不适合居住。
Texts.Eng: Those among the top 200 warriors do not communicate with anyone that is not of their race. Ever. Their code forbids any form of verbal congress outside of their people, no matter the reason. They will, however, communicate with gestures using head, limbs and digits.
